name: Space Race (Brutiful Games)
description:
Play as either the USA or USSR in a race to the moon!

Be the first country to launch 10 missions to win.

To play, type the name of an action in the center panel. The results of each action are listed below the action label.  

Actions consume Workforce Tokens. If you do not have any, you will be forced to do the action yourself.

Manage your National Pride while earning Funding and Research. If your national pride falls to 0, you lose.

In order to Launch a mission, you must conduct a Public Test of the launch level beforehand.

All code / art / sound by Christopher Walka ( Brutiful Games )

Audio mixing help from Sam Striker ( Native Darkness Productions).
